tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that structurally valid language tags are accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags with "_" are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags with invalid subtag sequences are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags are canonicalized in return values.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the default locale is a String value representing the
structurally valid and canonicalized BCP 47 language tag.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that well-formed currency codes are accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that invalid currency codes are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that valid time zone names are accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that invalid time zone names are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that additional time zone names, if accepted, are handled correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl has Object.prototype as its prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that default locale is available.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that appropriate fallback locales are provided for
    supported locales.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that canonicalization of locale lists treats undefined and empty lists the same.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a List is not affected by adversarial
    changes to Array.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that a single string instead of a locale list is treated
    as the locale list containing that string.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that non-objects are converted to objects before canonicalization.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that values other than strings are not accepted as locales.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that canonicalization of locale lists removes duplicate language tags.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that locales that are reported by resolvedOptions
    are also reported by supportedLocalesOf.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial
    changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that missing Unicode extension values default to true for
    boolean keys.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial
    changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a List is not affected by adversarial
    changes to Array.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that LookupSupportedLocales returns an empty list when
    given an empty list.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Unicode locale extension sequences do not affect
   whether a locale is considered supported, but are reported back.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that LookupSupportedLocales includes the default locale
    and doesn't include the "no linguistic content" locale.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option localeMatcher is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the array returned by SupportedLocales is extensible,
    but its properties are non-writable/non-configurable.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that an object can't be re-initialized as a Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial
    changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option localeMatcher is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the options numeric and caseFirst are processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests the special handling of the "co" key in Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the options numeric and caseFirst can be
    set through either the locale or the options.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option sensitivity is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option ignorePunctuation is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option usage is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that constructing a Collator doesn't create or modify
    unwanted properties on the RegExp constructor.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that for non-object values passed as this to Collator a
wrapper object will be initialized and returned.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator can be subclassed.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that objects constructed by Intl.Collator have the specified internal properties.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype has the required attributes.

Tests that Intl.Collator has a supportedLocalesOf
property, and it works as planned.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf
    doesn't access arguments that it's not given.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator.supportedLocalesOf
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator does not accept Unicode locale
    extension keys and values that are not allowed.

Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype.constructor is the
Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the function returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.compare
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that compare function is bound to its Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the function returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.compare
    returns 0 when comparing Strings that are considered canonically equivalent
    by the Unicode standard.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the compare function isn't entirely unreasonable.
    This test is not normative.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the compare function supports phonebook sorting if it says it does.
    This test is not normative.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the compare function supports different sensitivity settings.
    This test is not normative.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the getter for Intl.Collator.prototype.compare
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the object returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.resolvedOptions
    has the right properties.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype.resolvedOptions
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype is an object that
has been initialized as an Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype functions throw a
    TypeError if called on a non-object value or an object that hasn't been
    initialized as a Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype
    meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of
    chapter 15 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator instances have the specified properties.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that an object can't be re-initialized as a NumberFormat.

tests.description: Tests that the option style is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option currency is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the currency style can not be used without a specified currency.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the number of fractional digits is determined correctly for currencies.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option currencyDisplay is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the options minimumSignificantDigits and
    maximumSignificantDigits are read in the right sequence.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option useGrouping is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description:
Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial

tests.description: Tests that the option localeMatcher is processed correctly.

Tests that constructing a NumberFormat doesn't create or modify

Tests that for non-object values passed as this to NumberFormat a

Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.constructor is the

Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.format
converts other types to numbers.

tests.description: Tests that format function is bound to its Intl.NumberFormat.

tests.author: Roozbeh Pournader
tests.description:
Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.format
doesn't treat all numbers as negative.

tests.description:
Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.format
handles NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity properly.

tests.description:
Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.format

tests.description:
Tests that Intl.NumberFormat.prototype.format

tests.description: Tests that the digits are determined correctly when specifying pre/post decimal digits.
